translations: 叫唤（invoke 的过去式，过去分词）

sentences.sentence: She invoked several eminent scholars to back up her argument.
sentences.translation: 她援引了几位赫赫有名的学者来支持她的论点。

sentences.sentence: It is unlikely that libel laws will be invoked.
His name was invoked as a symbol of the revolution.
sentences.translation: 他的名字被提出作为那次革命的象征。
